38#ifndef CIPHER_H
39#define CIPHER_H
40
41#include <sys/types.h>
42#include <openssl/evp.h>
43#include "cipher-chachapoly.h"
44#include "cipher-aesctr.h"
45
46#define CIPHER_ENCRYPT 1
47#define CIPHER_DECRYPT 0
48
49struct sshcipher;
50#if 0
51struct sshcipher_ctx {
52 int plaintext;
53 int encrypt;
54 EVP_CIPHER_CTX *evp;
55 struct chachapoly_ctx cp_ctx; /* XXX union with evp? */
56 struct aesctr_ctx ac_ctx; /* XXX union with evp? */
57 const struct sshcipher *cipher;
58};
59#else
60struct sshcipher_ctx;
61#endif
62
63const struct sshcipher *cipher_by_name(const char *);
64const char *cipher_warning_message(const struct sshcipher_ctx *);
65int ciphers_valid(const char *);
66char *cipher_alg_list(char, int);
67int cipher_init(struct sshcipher_ctx **, const struct sshcipher *,
68 const u_char *, u_int, const u_char *, u_int, int);
69int cipher_crypt(struct sshcipher_ctx *, u_int, u_char *, const u_char *,
70 u_int, u_int, u_int);
71int cipher_get_length(struct sshcipher_ctx *, u_int *, u_int,
72 const u_char *, u_int);
73void cipher_free(struct sshcipher_ctx *);
74u_int cipher_blocksize(const struct sshcipher *);
75u_int cipher_keylen(const struct sshcipher *);
76u_int cipher_seclen(const struct sshcipher *);
77u_int cipher_authlen(const struct sshcipher *);
78u_int cipher_ivlen(const struct sshcipher *);
79u_int cipher_is_cbc(const struct sshcipher *);
80
81u_int cipher_ctx_is_plaintext(struct sshcipher_ctx *);
82
83int cipher_get_keyiv(struct sshcipher_ctx *, u_char *, size_t);
84int cipher_set_keyiv(struct sshcipher_ctx *, const u_char *, size_t);
85int cipher_get_keyiv_len(const struct sshcipher_ctx *);
86
87#endif /* CIPHER_H */
